attributes.value: Has a negative view of those who exercise power over others
Values decorum, dignity and proper behavior
Is disgusted by tradition and would flout any she encounters if given a chance
Believes that the creation and appreciation of artwork is one of the highest ideals
Sees introspection as important
Finds those that deny their impulses somewhat stiff
Finds those that develop skill with weapons and fighting distasteful
Believes that the time taken to master a skill is a horrible waste
Values hard work
Finds nature somewhat disturbing
Is quick to anger
Is generally quite confident of her abilities when undertaking specific ventures
Does not feel the slightest need to reciprocate favors that others do for her, no matter how major the help or how much she needed it
Tends to hang on to grievances
Is inattentive to detail in her own work
Dislikes obligations and will try to avoid being bound by them
Tries to keep her things orderly
Prefers to be alone
Is not readily moved by art or natural beauty
Weak
Tough
Little willpower
